title: Yakusoku no Neverland: Michishirube
content:
One of those recaps that jump you off mid-season, you know it's gonna get controversial when this card is raised, and to nobody's surprise, it was the case with Yakusoku no Neverland's second season.

Albeit, the recap did go through the first season as well, but as you might figure, if anyone is gonna want to refresh their mind on what happened earlier it would have been before starting this season in the first place.

I like to call myself, the recap guy for how many times I have to come in clutch and defend recap episodes in various series, but unfortunately, not this time. Mainly, becauseof bad timing and inconvenience, you don't just get to have a recap for a season that is already scares on episodes (only 11), it eating air-time real estate for what could have potentially lessened the pace rush towards the end, although, there was nothing going to save this sorry sequel from sucking as bad as it did.
